members.member:
\~English
(api:app=2.0.0) Include all main APIs
\~Chinese
(api:app=2.0.0) 集合了所有主要API

\~English
Get application's current status
Application's current status \~Chinese
获取应用程序当前的运行状态
应用程序运行状态

\~English
Get application's current mode
Application's current mode \~Chinese
获取应用程序当前的运行模式
应用程序运行模式

\~English
Get whether file writing is enabled for online acquisition and offline processing
Whether file writing is enabled for online acquisition and offline processing \~Chinese
检查是否为在线采集或离线处理生成模式
是否为在线采集或离线处理生成模式

\~English
Get application's language code
Application's language code, "en" means English, "ch" means Chinese \~Chinese
获取应用程序当前的显示语言
语言ID，如en表示英文，ch表示中文等

\~English
Get the timeline point of current interest
Timeline point of current interest, in seconds \~Chinese
获取应用程序当前兴趣点在时间线上的位置
在时间线上的兴趣点，单位秒

\~English
Get the host machine's date and time of current interest
Host machine's date and time of current interest, null if unavailable \~Chinese
获取应用程序当前兴趣点对应的本地时间
兴趣点的本地时间，若无数据则返回null

\~English
(api:app=2.3.0) Get the interest target
The interest target (in seconds), which could be out of the buffer range \~Chinese
(api:app=2.3.0) 获取兴趣时间点目标
兴趣时间点目标(秒单位)，可能超出数据缓存范围

\~English
Get the buffer range
The buffer range \~Chinese
获取应用程序当前的数据缓存范围
数据缓存范围

\~English
Get all session IDs under current data layer
Session IDs \~Chinese
获取当前数据层级下的所有session
Session ID列表

\~English
Get all filtered session IDs under current data layer
Session IDs \~Chinese
获取当前数据层级下筛选后的所有session
Session ID列表

\~English
Get all generations under current data path
Generation IDs \~Chinese
获取当前数据目录下的所有generation
Generation ID列表

\~English
Get the path of a session's data
Session ID The path of the session's data, null if it does not exist or not belongs to the current layer \~Chinese
获取某个session数据在硬盘的根路径
希望获取的session ID Session数据的根路径，若不存在或不属于当前层级则返回null

\~English
Get the path of a session's public data
Session ID The path of the session's public data, null if it doesn't exist or not belongs to the current layer \~Chinese
获取某个session的公共数据在硬盘的根路径
希望获取的session ID Session公共数据的根路径，若不存在或不属于当前层级则返回null

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Get the data layer to which a session belongs
Session ID The data layer, while '.' means the layer of sessions under data path, '..' means the layer of data path which is a session \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 获取某个session所属数据层级
Session ID 数据层级，其中'.'表示根路径下的session，'..'表示根路径即session

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Get the folder name of a session
Session ID Folder name \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 获取某个session的文件夹名
Session ID 文件夹名

\~English
Get the path of a generation with the specified generation ID and under the specified session
Session ID Generation ID The path of a generation, null if it doesn't exist or not belongs to current layer \~Chinese
获取某个session中的某个generation在硬盘的根路径
希望获取generation所属的session ID 希望获取的generation ID Generation数据的根路径，若不存在或不属于当前层级则返回null

\~English
(api:app=2.4.2) Get the status of generation with the specified generation ID and under the specified session
Session ID Generation ID Generation's status, null if it doesn't exist \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.2) 获取某个session中的某个generation的处理状态
希望获取generation所属的session ID 希望获取的generation ID Generation的处理状态，若generation不存在则返回null

\~English
Get all sessions of which the generations are finished processing
Generation ID Session IDs \~Chinese
获取当前层级下某个generation下所有处理完毕的session
目标generation 处理完毕的session ID列表

\~English
(api:app=2.6.5) Refresh the sessions under the current layer
\~Chinese
(api:app=2.6.5) 刷新当前层级下所有session

\~English
Refresh all the generations of the current sessions
\~Chinese
刷新当前层级下所有session的generation

\~English
Get current generation ID of input data
Current generation ID of input data, null means the input source is raw data (not any generation) \~Chinese
获取当前输入数据的generation ID
当前输入数据的generation ID，空表示输入数据为原始数据

\~English
Get current session's GUID
Current session's GUID, null if application is not in running status \~Chinese
获取当前session的GUID
当前session的GUID，若未运行则返回null

\~English
Deprecated, use ASEva.Agency.GetHostPosixTimeModel
\~Chinese
已弃用，应使用 ASEva.Agency.GetHostPosixTimeModel

\~English
Deprecated, use ASEva.Agency.GetGNSSPosixTimeModel
\~Chinese
已弃用，应使用 ASEva.Agency.GetGNSSPosixTimeModel

\~English
Deprecated, use ASEva.Agency.GetLocalDateTime
\~Chinese
已弃用，应使用 ASEva.Agency.GetLocalDateTime

\~English
Deprecated, use ASEva.Agency.GetUTCDateTime
\~Chinese
已弃用，应使用 ASEva.Agency.GetUTCDateTime

\~English
Deprecated, use ASEva.Agency.GetHostPosixTimeModel
\~Chinese
已弃用，应使用 ASEva.Agency.GetHostPosixTimeModel

\~English
Deprecated, use ASEva.Agency.GetGNSSPosixTimeModel
\~Chinese
已弃用，应使用 ASEva.Agency.GetGNSSPosixTimeModel

\~English
Get the current data path
The data path, null if not configured \~Chinese
获取当前数据目录的路径
当前数据目录的路径，若未设置返回null

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Deprecated, use ASEva.Agency.GetSubDataPaths
\~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 已弃用，应使用 ASEva.Agency.GetSubDataPaths

\~English
(api:app=2.6.12) Get all sub data paths
Sub data paths, null if they don't exist \~Chinese
(api:app=2.6.12) 获取所有子数据目录的路径
所有子数据目录的路径，目录不存在则为null

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Set sub data path
Index, ranges 0~3 Sub data path \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 设置子数据目录的路径
子数据目录序号，0~3 子数据目录的路径

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Get all data layers
Data layers, while '.' means the layer of sessions under data path, '..' means the layer of data path which is session \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 获取所有有效的数据层级
数据层级列表，其中'.'表示根路径下的session，'..'表示根路径即session

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Add a new data layer
Data layer \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 添加新的数据层级
数据层级

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Remove data layer, and delete files to recycle bin
Data layer \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 移除数据层级，并删除所有文件至回收站
数据层级

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Get current data layer
The current data layer, while null means all layers, '.' means the layer of sessions under data path, '..' means the layer of data path which is session \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 获取当前的数据层级
数据层级，其中null表示所有层级，'.'表示根路径下的session，'..'表示根路径即session

\~English
(api:app=2.6.5) Get the path of current data layer
The path of current data layer, returns null if the data path is not configured or the current data layer is '..', return data path if the current data layer is null (all layers) \~Chinese
(api:app=2.6.5) 获取当前数据层级的路径
当前数据层级的路径，若数据目录未设置或数据层级为'..'则返回null，若当前数据层级为null(所有层级)则返回数据目录根路径

\~English
(api:app=2.4.0) Set current data layer
The current data layer, while null means all layers, '.' means the layer of sessions under data path, '..' means the layer of data path which is session \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.0) 设置当前的数据层级
数据层级，其中null表示所有层级，'.'表示根路径下的session，'..'表示根路径即session

\~English
Get the path of global public data
The path of global public data, null if the data path is not configured \~Chinese
获取当前全局公共数据目录的路径
当前全局公共数据目录的路径，若未设置返回null

\~English
Get the path of current application's config files
The path of current application's config files \~Chinese
获取当前应用程序的配置文件根目录路径
配置文件根目录路径

\~English
Get the path of current application's data and document files
The path of current application's data and document files \~Chinese
获取应用数据和文档文件根目录路径
应用数据和文档文件根目录路径

\~English
Get the path of current application's temporary files
The path of current application's temporary files \~Chinese
获取当前应用程序临时文件根目录路径
临时文件根目录路径

\~English
Transmit bus message, either periodically or once (only available in online mode)
The bus message \~Chinese
发送总线报文，可周期性发送，也可单次发送（仅在线模式可用）
想要发送的报文信息

\~English
Transmit bound bus message, either periodically or once (only available in online mode)
Message ID of bound bus message Transmit period, in milliseconds (at least 10). If it is set to null, it is transmitted only once \~Chinese
发送总线报文（该报文需设置绑定），可周期性发送，也可单次发送（仅在线模式可用）
绑定的报文ID 报文发送周期，单位毫秒（至少为10），若设为null则只发送一次

\~English
(api:app=2.6.15) Transmit bound bus message, either periodically or once (only available in online mode)
Message ID of bound bus message Transmit period, in milliseconds (at least 10). If it is set to null, it is transmitted only once Generated bus message data, null if not bound \~Chinese
(api:app=2.6.15) 发送总线报文（该报文需设置绑定），可周期性发送，也可单次发送（仅在线模式可用）
绑定的报文ID 报文发送周期，单位毫秒（至少为10），若设为null则只发送一次 输出生成的报文数据，若未绑定则输出null

\~English
Transmitted received general raw data (only available in online mode)
General raw data's channel ID, corresponding to the first column of input/raw/raw.csv Numeric data Binary data \~Chinese
发送已获取的原始数据信息（仅在线模式可用）
原始数据协议名称，对应input/raw/raw.csv首列文字 数值数据 二进制数据

\~English
(api:app=2.8.0) Transmitted received general raw data (only available in online mode)
CPU tick while data arriving General raw data's channel ID, corresponding to the first column of input/raw/raw.csv Numeric data Binary data \~Chinese
(api:app=2.8.0) 发送已获取的原始数据信息（仅在线模式可用）
数据的到达时CPU计数 原始数据协议名称，对应input/raw/raw.csv首列文字 数值数据 二进制数据

\~English
Send manual trigger signal
Channel of manual trigger, ranges 0~15 \~Chinese
发送手动触发器信号
手动触发器通道，0~15

\~English
Get graph's data
Session ID Graph's ID, queried by ASEva.GraphDefinition.GetID Graph's data, null if it doesn't exist or not belongs to current data layer \~Chinese
获取图表对象
想要获取图表的session ID 图表报告ID，通过 ASEva.GraphDefinition.GetID 获取 图表对象，若不存在或不属于当前层级则返回null

\~English
Add a new scenario data
Scenario data \~Chinese
添加一个场景片段
想要添加的场景片段描述

\~English
Get status of a general device
General device's type ID, the same as the "type" field in info.txt Status of the general device \~Chinese
获取设备状态
设备的类型ID，在插件的info.txt中以type字段描述 返回设备状态

\~English
(api:app=2.3.0) Get all general devices' status
The dictionary, with key as type ID of general device \~Chinese
(api:app=2.3.0) 获取所有设备状态
设备状态表，键为设备的类型ID

\~English
Get status of a general device's sub devices
General device's type ID, the same as the "type" field in info.txt Status of a general device's sub devices \~Chinese
获取各子设备的设备状态
设备的类型ID，在插件的info.txt中以type字段描述 各子设备的设备状态

\~English
Print for debugging, use ASEva.Logger when you need to specify the source
The message \~Chinese
打印信息用于调试，需要指定来源时应使用 ASEva.Logger
想要打印的文本

\~English
Log message
The message Log's level \~Chinese
添加清单信息
想要显示的信息 清单信息级别

\~English
Whether the bus message ID is valid, for example, it's invalid if corresponding dbc file isn't loaded correctly
Bus message ID Whether it can be null Whether the bus message ID is valid \~Chinese
查看报文配置是否有效，如dbc文件加载不正确则可能导致无效
报文的全局唯一ID 是否为可选配置 是否有效

\~English
Whether the signal ID is valid, for example, it's invalid if corresponding dbc file or plugin file isn't loaded correctly
Signal ID Whether it can be null Whether the signal ID is valid \~Chinese
查看信号配置是否有效，如dbc文件加载不正确，插件文件未加载都可能导致无效
信号的全局唯一ID 是否为可选配置 是否有效

\~English
Get all signal names of the bus message
Bus message ID Signal names, null if the bus message ID is invalid \~Chinese
获取指定报文ID下的所有信号名称
报文的全局唯一ID 信号列表，若该报文不存在则返回null

\~English
Get whether Internet is connected
Whether Internet is connected \~Chinese
当前互联网是否已连接
是否已连接互联网

\~English
Get memory capacity
Memory capacity, in bytes, zero if failed to query \~Chinese
获取内存容量
内存容量，单位为字节，获取失败时返回0

\~English
Call Web API (GET) asynchronously
The request The context of calling. Since this function is non-blocking, the context needs to be used to get the status and response at a future time after it ends \~Chinese
非阻塞调用Web API (GET)
调用请求 调用上下文。由于本函数为非阻塞，在结束后需要通过该对象在未来时刻获取调用状态和响应字符串

\~English
Call Web API (POST) asynchronously, default content type is ASEva.WebPostContentType.WWWFormUrlEncoded
The request Binary data body The context of calling. Since this function is non-blocking, the context needs to be used to get the status and response at a future time after it ends \~Chinese
非阻塞调用Web API (POST)，内容类型默认为 ASEva.WebPostContentType.WWWFormUrlEncoded
调用请求 提交的二进制数据body 调用上下文。由于本函数为非阻塞，在结束后需要通过该对象在未来时刻获取调用状态和响应字符串

\~English
(api:app=2.0.4) Call Web API (POST) asynchronously with the specified content type
The request Binary data body Content type The context of calling. Since this function is non-blocking, the context needs to be used to get the status and response at a future time after it ends \~Chinese
(api:app=2.0.4) 非阻塞调用Web API (POST)，指定内容类型
调用请求 提交的二进制数据body 内容类型 调用上下文。由于本函数为非阻塞，在结束后需要通过该对象在未来时刻获取调用状态和响应字符串

\~English
Get alias name of data channel
Data channel ID, with format as "protocol@channel". Channel is starting from 0. Protocol with "v" version number is with backward compatibility. The video channel's protocol is "video" Data channel ID, null if not found \~Chinese
获取数据通道别名
数据通道关键字，格式为"协议名@通道序号"，通道序号从0开始，协议名中带"v"字版本号的可向下兼容。视频协议名为video 数据通道别名，若未找到返回null

\~English
(api:app=2.4.4) Get all data channels' alias name
The dictionary, with key as data channel ID \~Chinese
(api:app=2.4.4) 获取数据通道别名
数据所有通道的别名表

\~English
(api:app=2.3.0) Get whether there're multiple components outputting data with the same sample channel ID
Sample channel ID, with format as "protocol@channel". Channel is starting from 0. Protocol with "v" version number is with backward compatibility Whether conflict exists \~Chinese
(api:app=2.3.0) 检查样本数据通道是否冲突（有多个模块输出相同协议和通道的样本数据）
样本通道协议，格式为"协议名@通道序号"，通道序号从0开始，协议名中带"v"字版本号的可向下兼容 是否冲突

\~English
Get whether the sample channel is available (data output by other component)
Sample channel ID, with format as "protocol@channel". Channel is starting from 0. Protocol with "v" version number is with backward compatibility Whether the sample channel is available \~Chinese
检查指定的输入样本通道是否可用
样本通道关键字，格式为"协议名@通道序号"，通道序号从0开始，协议名中带"v"字版本号的可向下兼容 该通道是否可用

\~English
Get field titles of a general sample
Sample channel ID, with format as "protocol@channel". Channel is starting from 0. Protocol with "v" version number is with backward compatibility Field title, null if the channel doesn't exist or there's no titles \~Chinese
获取指定样本通道对应的标题
样本通道关键字，格式为"协议名@通道序号"，通道序号从0开始 样本标题，null表示通道不存在或该样本通道无标题

\~English
Get all manual trigger names
Manual trigger names \~Chinese
获得手动触发器所有通道的名称
名称列表

\~English
Get name of manual trigger at the channel
Channel index, ranges 0~15 Name of manual trigger, null if the index is over the bound \~Chinese
获得手动触发器通道的名称
通道序号，0~15 手动触发器通道的名称，若序号超出范围则返回null

\~English
Set the name of manual trigger at a channel
Channel index, ranges 0~15 Name of manual trigger, do nothing if it's null \~Chinese
设定手动触发器通道的名称
通道序号，0~15 手动触发器通道的名称，若值为空则忽略

\~English
Add signal reference (only signals with references will be sent to app layer)
Signal ID \~Chinese
添加信号引用，在应用层才可获得该信号的数据
信号ID

\~English
Remove signal reference
Signal ID \~Chinese
移除信号引用
信号ID

\~English
Run a standalone task, only available while idle
The caller who calls this API, can be object of ASEva.MainWorkflow , ASEva.WindowClass , ASEva.DialogClass , WindowPanel, ConfigPanel , etc. Task class ID Configuration string Return value string Result of the task \~Chinese
运行一个独立处理任务，仅限空闲时运行
调用此API的对象，可为以下类型： ASEva.MainWorkflow , ASEva.WindowClass , ASEva.DialogClass , WindowPanel, ConfigPanel等 任务组件的类别ID 配置的字符串描述 任务的返回值信息 任务运行结果

\~English
Set interest with host machine's date and time
Host machine's date and time \~Chinese
按本地日期时间设置兴趣点
本地日期时间

\~English
Set interest with timeline point
Timeline point \~Chinese
按时间线设置兴趣点
时间线

\~English
Delete file or folder to recycle bin
Path of file or folder Whether successful \~Chinese
删除指定文件或文件夹至回收站
文件或文件夹路径 是否成功

\~English
(api:app=2.6.1) Get all keys of global variable
All keys of global variable \~Chinese
(api:app=2.6.1) 获取所有全局变量的键
所有全局变量的键

\~English
(api:app=2.6.1) Get all keys of global parameter
All keys of global parameter \~Chinese
(api:app=2.6.1) 获取所有全局参数的键
所有全局参数的键

\~English
(api:app=2.6.1) Get all keys of global path
All keys of global path \~Chinese
(api:app=2.6.1) 获取所有全局路径的键
所有全局路径的键

\~English
Set value of global variable
Key of global variable, do nothing if it's null or empty Value of global variable, do nothing if it's null \~Chinese
设置全局变量
全局变量key，若为null或""则忽略 全局变量value，若为null则忽略

\~English
Get value of global variable
Key of global variable Default value, which will be returned while key is null, empty, or doesn't exist Value of global variable \~Chinese
获取全局变量
全局变量key 默认值，即当key为null、""、或不存在时返回的值 全局变量value

\~English
Set value of global parameter
Key of global parameter, do nothing if it's null or empty Value of global parameter, do nothing if it's null \~Chinese
设置全局参数
全局参数key，若为null或""则忽略 全局参数value，若为null则忽略

\~English
Get value of global parameter
Key of global parameter Default value, which will be returned while key is null, empty, or doesn't exist Value of global parameter \~Chinese
获取全局参数
全局参数key 默认值，即当key为null、""、或不存在时返回的值 全局参数value

\~English
Get global path
Key of global path Global path(s) separated by ';' (Only the ones exist), null if key is null or empty \~Chinese
获取全局路径
全局路径key 以分号分割的全局路径value（仅返回存在的部分），若key为null、""则返回null

\~English
Set global path
Key of global parameter, do nothing if it's null or empty Global path(s) separated by ';', while the ones not exist will be ignored \~Chinese
设置全局路径
全局路径key，若为null或""则忽略 以分号分割的全局路径value，不存在的部分将被忽略

\~English
Get information of all bus protocol files bound to any bus channel
Information of all bus protocol files, multiple files could be bound to the same bus channel \~Chinese
获取所有总线通道上的协议信息
总线协议信息列表，同个文件的多个通道将分列

\~English
Get the bound channel of bus protocol file
Bus protocol file ID (In the case of multiple channels, the channel name is included) Bus channel (1~16), null if not bound \~Chinese
获取总线协议文件当前配置于哪个通道
文件ID（多通道的情况下包括通道名） 总线通道（1~16），若未配置则返回null

\~English
Get all bus signals should be parsed as a 32bit floating number
Signal IDs \~Chinese
获取所有作为32位浮点解析的信号列表
信号ID列表

\~English
Get frame rate of messages with the same local ID at the same channel
Bus channel, ranges 1~16 Local ID of bus message Frame rate, 0 means invalid \~Chinese
获取指定通道收到的指定ID报文的帧率
总线通道，1~16 通道内的报文ID 每秒帧率，0表示无效

\~English
Get information of message with the specified local ID at the specified channel
Bus channel, ranges 1~16 Local ID of bus message Message information, null if not found \~Chinese
获取指定通道上指定ID报文信息
总线通道，1~16 通道内的报文ID 总线报文信息，无信息则返回null

\~English
Get information of message with the specified ID

(api:app=2.7.1) 视频编码格式

\~English
Invalid
\~Chinese
无效

\~English
MJPEG: Lossy encoding, independent frames
\~Chinese
MJPEG：有损编码，帧间独立

\~English
H.264: Lossy encoding, inter-frame dependence
\~Chinese
H.264：有损编码，帧间依赖

\~English
YUV411: Lossless encoding, independent frames, the format is (U0 Y0 V0 Y1 U4 Y2 V4 Y3 Y4 Y5 Y6 Y7) per 8 pixels, 8 bits per value
\~Chinese
YUV411：无损编码，帧间独立，格式为每8像素(U0 Y0 V0 Y1 U4 Y2 V4 Y3 Y4 Y5 Y6 Y7)，每数值8bit

\~English
YUV420: Lossless encoding, independent frames, the format is (U V Y00 Y01 Y10 Y11) per 2x2 pixels, 8 bits per value
\~Chinese
YUV420：无损编码，帧间独立，格式为每2x2像素(U V Y00 Y01 Y10 Y11)，每数值8bit

\~English
H.265: Lossy encoding, inter-frame dependence
\~Chinese
H.265：有损编码，帧间依赖

\~English
YUV422: Lossless encoding, independent frames, the format is (Y0 U Y1 V) per 2 pixels , 8 bits per value
\~Chinese
YUV422：无损编码，帧间独立，格式为每2像素(Y0 U Y1 V)，每数值8bit

\~English
RAW: Lossless encoding, independent frames, the format is BG on 024... rows, GR on 135... rows, 8 bits per value
\~Chinese
RAW：无损编码，帧间独立，格式为024...行BG，135...行GR，每数值8bit

\~English
(api:app=2.7.5) RAW12: Lossless encoding, independent frames, the format is BG on 024... rows, GR on 135... rows, 12 bits per value
\~Chinese
(api:app=2.7.5) RAW12：无损编码，帧间独立，格式为024...行BG，135...行GR，每数值12bit按小字序依次存储

\~English
(api:app=2.7.5) RAW14: Lossless encoding, independent frames, the format is BG on 024... rows, GR on 135... rows, 14 bits per value
\~Chinese
(api:app=2.7.5) RAW14：无损编码，帧间独立，格式为024...行BG，135...行GR，每数值14bit按小字序依次存储

\~English
(api:app=2.9.1) RAW16: Lossless encoding, independent frames, the format is BG on 024... rows, GR on 135... rows, 16 bits per value
\~Chinese
(api:app=2.9.1) RAW16：无损编码，帧间独立，格式为024...行BG，135...行GR，每数值16bit按大字序依次存储

\~English
(api:app=2.9.1) Y16: Lossless encoding, independent frames, 16 bits (big endian) per value
\~Chinese
(api:app=2.9.1) Y16：无损编码，帧间独立，每数值16bit按大字序依次存储

\~English
\~Chinese
获取指定通道在指定时间上的视频帧的原始尺寸
视频通道，0~23 获取视频帧的目标时间线，单位秒 原始尺寸，若无数据则返回null

\~English
\~Chinese
获取距离指定时间最近的视频帧数据
视频通道，0~23 获取视频帧的目标时间线，单位秒 容许的最大间隔，单位秒 视频数据输出模式 在输出模式基础上进一步裁剪，为原始尺寸坐标系，至少为16x16，null表示完整输出 是否输出带Alpha通道的图像(固定赋值255) 输出图像的时间戳，获取失败则为null 摄像头信息，获取失败则为null 视频帧数据，图像实际大小由mode和clip决定，获取失败则返回null

\~English
\~Chinese
获取距离指定时间最近的缩略图数据
视频通道，0~23 获取视频帧的目标时间线，单位秒 容许的最大间隔，单位秒 是否输出带Alpha通道的图像(固定赋值255) 缩略图数据，图像宽度固定为80，获取失败则返回null
